name: ZMQ Development
briefDescription: ZMQ is a “Technology for Development” NGO which creates practical technology linked tools & solutions to empower communities by providing timely information and connecting them with life-saving services, thus achieving sustainable development. ZMQ works on three basic social issues - healthcare, education and livelihood generation with an approach to solve the social problems using technology is based on a system-changing approach. We have reached to over 300,000 beneficiaries.
